title: On the Greenfield Lake Park bike path along East Lakeshore drive, for years there has been a working water fountain for both people and dogs. The past month it has been not working and the COW park people I have asked had no idea when it might be repaired or it ever will be. Can you find out?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/05/when-will-the-water-fountain-at-greenfield-lake-park-be-fixed/
